metadata.title: ICT Police nab three notorious dacoits, recover stolen goods

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Jul 17 (APP):Islamabad Capital Territory (ICT) Police, Kohsar Police Station team has arrested three wanted members of a notorious snatcher gang involved in multiple street crimes and snatching incidents across the capital. A public relations officer told APP on Thursday that the arrested suspects were identified as Ahmed Sabbir, Imran Ullah, and Naqeeb Ullah. The police team recovered snatched motorbikes, a laptop, several mobile phones, cash, a car, and illegal weapons from their possession. He said cases had already been registered against the accused, and further investigation is currently underway. He said that Senior Superintendent of Police (SSP) Operations Muhammad Shoaib Khan had directed officers to intensify operations against criminals and ensure all necessary measures are taken to safeguard the life and property of citizens. He said criminal elements will not be allowed to disrupt the peace of the federal capital.
